name: @kalisio/leaflet-pmtiles
description: Toolset to visualise PMTiles more easily in Leaflet.js

scripts.dev: npm run dist && onchange 'src/**/*.*' -- npm run dist
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build-min && npm run build-module && shx cp dist/leaflet-pmtiles*.js demo
scripts.publish: git push origin HEAD --tags && git push origin
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
